name: TapMax
description:
Ever counted from 100 to 1. Tough or Easy??

This game is inspired by that.
A Simple Maths Game.
Test your focus.
Good for focus training.

HOW TO PLAY :
Tap the numbers in descending order.
(Maximum number first)

Features:
- Simple UI
- Leaderboard
- 3x3 (Tiny) Grid
- 4x4 (Classic) Grid
- Share Score

COLLAPSE
